review: Arkham Asylum is an incredible stealth combat game, with an intricate and detailed story line. the combat system can feel a little simple at times and slightly repitive, but this is generally outweighed by the variety of enemies.This game has beautifully made environments that are signature throughout the Batman series, as well as having well thought out challenges that can be completed in various ways and are extremely rewardingoverall this game is a must have for any batman fan, or anyone into stealth combat games
